knimeNode.name: Auto Active Learn Loop End (Legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Automated oracle for the active learn loop.

fullDescription.intro: Acts as an automated oracle for an active learning loop. It is meant for testing purposes and requires an fully labeled input table at the second input port.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the class labels in the ground truth table.
The number of times the loop will run until termination.

ports.inPort: Table with data to be labeled by the node.
Ground truth table used to look up the labels. This table only needs to have a class column
Pass through Port - Will be the output of the Loop
